name: Gold prices - Laurence & Williamson (2017)
title: Gold prices - Laurence & Williamson (2017)
description: Gold prices are based on New York Market Prices, and are measured in US$ per kilogram.

sources.additionalInfo: Gold prices are based on New York Market Prices, and are measured in US$ per kilogram.
sources.dataPublishedBy: Lawrence H. Officer and Samuel H. Williamson (2017). "The Price of Gold, 1257-Present," MeasuringWorth.
